Cons:

Tra i video games online per PC più giocati al mondo. 

Gameplay originale, anche se spesso frustrante. Per chi è alle prime armi può rivelarsi noioso, ma basta un po' di pratica con i bot. 

Lo considero anch'ora un ottimo prodotto, nonostante sia stato rilasciato da molti anni. 

Strategico ed assai divertente. Sia per il prezzo che per la qualità del prodotto, è un gioco da possedere. 

Un classico per ogni PC gamer.

R.I.P  Counter - Strike 1.6

an okay game once in will if you're bored and just want to shoot something. This game is very intense and if you lose focus for like 1 second BOOM HEADSHOT, and you're dead. It has little to do with teamwork as if such, if your individual skill is high you can pretty much own like everything. At least that is my experience. anyways it's a great game, since you play 1 round and then respawn. If you can't play for long on a busy day this is defriently your game.

Whats great about Counter Strike, is that its a simple FPS with lots of variety in maps and mods. Maps: planting bombs, rescuing hostages, running from zombies, knife only, scoutknivez, awp only, Warcraft 3 RPG mod, Gungame mod, etc. You have the ability to make your own maps and mods as well. Looking for servers is easy, and simple unlike some games that dont even show you ping! (Left 4 Dead cough). Rounds are usually pretty quick and you can play as long as little as you want. Used to play this game a lot back in the day, and have recently been getting into it a lot. If you like adrenaline rushes and shooting people in real time, then this game is for you :)

Обычный командный шутер. Хороший баланс, нетребовательность к ресурсам, наличие достижений. Игра для того, чтобы просто погонять на досуге или понагибать (если получиться). Огорчает всё та же проблема, что и с остальными сетевыми играми Valve - при большом пинге (150 и выше) играть становится не так комфортно. Можешь всадить во врага обойму, а на деле попадут пара-тройка пуль. А всё из-за того, что на момент приёма сигнала о выстреле от нашего компа сервер уже знает, что враг находится несколько в другом месте и выстрелы проходят мимо.

Counter-Strike:Source .....

This is the game you play if you want competitive first person shooter action, there is no game like it, and there probably won't be for many years to come.

On the flipside, there is many mods and custom maps that are just plain fun to play with either randoms or friends or both!

Definitely a game worth owning even just for the replayability alone.

If you're tired of massive online shooters with spawn-and-die gameplay, this game will put your skills to the test. Short round-based 4 minute games shoot-to-kill is what this game is all about. No more respawning after 20 seconds. Balanced game-play and weapons. You will want good aim and a balanced trigger finger for this game, or you can expect to be pwn3d.
get it!
